name: Forest Defender (Henrique Grecco)
description:
Hello everyone, my name is Henrique, I wanted to put into practice my knowledge of programming and the unity tool to make this game.

I used some assets which I'll leave below, It's very simple, It only has 6 levels, I hope you have fun!

Know more about me below

https://linktr.ee/henrique.c.grecco

Resources used

Scenery - Pixel Adventure 1

Scenery & Music - SunnyLand ArtWork

Cursor - Pixel Cursors

Icon - SunnyLand ArtWork

Thanks!
